design_tools¶

Created on Wed Mar 6 16:46:04 2019

@author: yoelr

biosteam.units.design_tools.calculate_vacuum_system_power_and_cost(F_mass, F_vol, P_suction, vessel_volume, vacuum_system_preference=None)[source]¶

Return power (kW) and cost (USD) of vacuum system.

Parameters

  • F_mass (float) – Vapor mass flow rate entering vacuum system from vessel in kg/hr (not including inleakage).

  • F_vol (float) – Vapor volumetric flow rate entering vacuum system from vessel in m3/hr (not including inleakage).

  • P_suction (float) – Suction pressure in Pa

  • vessel_volume (float) – Vacuum volume in m3

  • vacuum_system_preference (tuple[str] or str) – Name(s) of preferred vacuum systems

biosteam.units.design_tools.GTable(DRho, Hlr)[source]¶

Return the allowable downflow (baffle liquid load) in gph/ft2, usually used for vertical vessel.

Parameters

  • DRho (float) – Density difference between light liquid and vapor [lb/ft^3 ?]

  • Hlr (float) – Height of liquid level above the interphase of light liquid and heavy liquid [ft]

biosteam.units.design_tools.HNATable(Type, X)[source]¶

Table for cylindrical height and area conversions.

Parameters

  • Type (int) – 1 if given H/D and find A/At, 2 if given A/At and find H/D.

  • X (float) – H/D or A/At.

biosteam.units.design_tools.ceil_half_step(value)[source]¶

Return value to the next/highest 0.5 units

biosteam.units.design_tools.compute_vessel_weight_and_wall_thickness(P, D, L, rho_M, Je=0.85)[source]¶

Return vessel weight and wall thickness.

Parameters

  • P (float) – Pressure [psia].

  • D (float) – Diameter [ft].

  • L (float) – Vessel length [ft].

  • rho_M (float) – Density of Material [lb/ft^3].

  • Je (float) – Joint efficiency (1.0 for X-Rayed joints, 0.85 for thin carbon steel),

biosteam.units.design_tools.compute_Stokes_law_York_Demister_K_value(P)[source]¶

Return K-constant in Stoke’s Law using the York-Demister equation.

Parameters

P (float) – Pressure [psia].

biosteam.units.design_tools.size_batch(v_0, tau, tau_0, N_reactors, V_wf) → dict[source]¶

Solve for batch reactor volume, cycle time, and loading time

Parameters

  • v_0 – Flow rate

  • tau – Reaction time

  • tau_0 – Turnaround time

  • N_reactors – Number of reactors

  • V_wf – Fraction of working volume

Returns

dict[str –

  • ‘Reactor volume’

  • ’Cycle time’

  • ’Loading time’

Return type

float]

biosteam.units.design_tools.compute_purchase_cost_of_trays(N_T, Di, F_TT, F_TM)[source]¶

Return total cost of all trays at BioSTEAM’s CEPCI.

Parameters

  • N_T (int) – Number of trays.

  • Di (float) – Inner diameter [ft].

  • F_TT (float) – Tray type factor.

  • F_TM (float) – Tray material factor.

biosteam.units.design_tools.compute_purchase_cost_of_tower(Di, L, W, F_VM)[source]¶

Return cost of tower at BioSTEAM’s CEPCI.

Parameters

  • Di (float) – Inner diameter [ft]

  • L (float) – length [ft]

  • W (float) – weight [lb].

  • F_VM (float) – Column material factor.

biosteam.units.design_tools.compute_empty_tower_cost(W)[source]¶

Return the cost [C_V; in USD] of an empty tower vessel assuming a CE of 500.

Parameters

W (float) – Weight [lb].

biosteam.units.design_tools.compute_plaform_ladder_cost(Di, L)[source]¶

Return C_PL, the cost (USD) of platforms and ladders assuming a CE of 500.

Parameters

  • Di (float) – Inner diameter [ft].

  • L (float) – Legnth [ft].

biosteam.units.design_tools.compute_weight(Di, L, tv, rho_M)[source]¶

Return W, the weight (lb) of the tower assuming 2:1 elliptical head.

Parameters

  • Di (float) – Inner diameter ([ft].

  • L (float) – Legnth [ft].

  • tv (float) – Shell thickness [in].

  • rho_M (floa) – Density of material [lb/in^3].

biosteam.units.design_tools.compute_wall_thickness(Po, Di, L, S=15000, E=None, M=29.5)[source]¶

Return tv, the wall thinkness (in) designed to withstand the internal pressure and the wind/earthquake load at the bottom.

Parameters

  • Po (float) – Operating internal pressure (psi)

  • Di (float) – Internal diameter (ft)

  • L (float) – Height (ft)

  • S (float) – Maximum stress (psi)

  • E (float) – Fractional weld efficiency

  • M (float) – Elasticity (psi)

biosteam.units.design_tools.compute_tray_base_purchase_cost(Di)[source]¶

Return C_BT, the base cost of a tray (USD) at a CE of 500.

Parameters

Di (float) – Inner diameter [ft].

biosteam.units.design_tools.compute_n_trays_factor(N_T)[source]¶

Return the cost factor for number of trays, F_NT.

Parameters

N_T (Number of trays) –

biosteam.units.design_tools.compute_murphree_stage_efficiency(mu, alpha, L, V)[source]¶

Return the sectional murphree efficiency, E_mv.

Parameters

  • mu (float) – Viscosity (mPa*s)

  • alpha (float) – Relative volatility.

  • L (float) – Liquid flow rate by mol.

  • V (float) – Vapor flow rate by mol/

biosteam.units.design_tools.compute_flow_parameter(L, V, rho_V, rho_L)[source]¶

Return the flow parameter, F_LV.

Parameters

  • L (float) – Liquid flow rate by mass.

  • V (float) – Vapor flow rate by mass.

  • rho_V (float) – Vapor density.

  • rho_L (float) – Liquid density.

biosteam.units.design_tools.compute_max_capacity_parameter(TS, F_LV)[source]¶

Return the maximum capacity parameter before flooding [C_sbf; in m/s].

Parameters

  • TS (float) – Tray spacing [mm].

  • F_LV (float) – Flow parameter.

biosteam.units.design_tools.compute_max_vapor_velocity(C_sbf, sigma, rho_L, rho_V, F_F, A_ha)[source]¶

Return the maximum allowable vapor velocity through the net area of flow before flooding [U_f; in m/s].

Parameters

  • C_sbf – Maximum Capacity Parameter (m/s)

  • sigma – Liquid surface tension (dyn/cm)

  • rho_L – Liquid density

  • rho_V – Vapor density

  • F_F – Foaming factor

  • A_ha – Ratio of open area, A_h, to active area, A_a

biosteam.units.design_tools.compute_downcomer_area_fraction(F_LV)[source]¶

Return the ratio of downcomer area to net (total) area, A_dn.

Parameters

F_LV (float) – Flow parameter.

biosteam.units.design_tools.compute_diameter(V_vol, U_f, f, A_dn)[source]¶

Return column diameter [D_T; in ft].

Parameters

  • V_vol (float) – Vapor volumetric flow rate [m^3/s].

  • U_f (float) – Maximum vapor velocity before flooding [m/s].

  • f (float) – Ratio of actual velocity to U_f.

  • A_dn (float) – Ratio of downcomer area to net (total) area.

biosteam.units.design_tools.compute_height(TS, N_stages: int, top=True, bot=True)[source]¶

Return the height of the column [H; ft].

Parameters

  • TS (float) – Tray spacing [mm].

  • N_stages (float) – Number of stages.
